result.purpose: Responsible for providing services related to decentralized exchange operations, including token management and cross-chain swaps.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, where each file represents a specific service or functionality related to decentralized exchanges.

internal/domains/dex/services/provider/k.purpose: Defines the Katana service for managing token configurations and interactions with the Katana protocol.
Implements the KyberSwap provider for decentralized exchange operations.

internal/domains/dex/services/provider/p.purpose: Provides services for decentralized exchange (DEX) operations including route fetching and token management.

internal/domains/dex/services/provider/r.purpose: Implements a relay service for cross-chain swaps in a decentralized exchange.
